trans-unit.source: Serves as the base class for Microsoft Office Ribbon customizations.
trans-unit.target: 作为 Microsoft Office 功能区自定义项的基类。

trans-unit.source: When you add a new **Ribbon (Visual Designer)** item to an Office project, Visual Studio adds a Ribbon class that inherits from <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase> to the project.
trans-unit.target: 添加新**功能区 （可视化设计器）**项到 Office 项目，Visual Studio 将添加功能区类，该类继承<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase>到项目。

trans-unit.source: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase> contains methods and properties that are common to all Ribbon classes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase> 包含方法和属性所共有的所有功能区类。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Ribbon Designer](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-designer.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[功能区设计器](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-designer.md)。

trans-unit.source: Some properties of <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase> can be set only before the Ribbon is loaded into the Office application.
trans-unit.target: 某些属性<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase>只能在功能区加载到 Office 应用程序之前，才可以设置。

trans-unit.source: For information about setting these properties, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关设置这些属性的信息，请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: Usage
trans-unit.target: 用法

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Do not use this constructor to create an instance of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase> class.
trans-unit.target: 不使用此构造函数创建的实例<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase>类。

trans-unit.source: When you add a new **Ribbon (Visual Designer)** item to a project, Visual Studio creates an instance of a class that inherits from <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase>.
trans-unit.target: 添加新**功能区 （可视化设计器）**项目到项目，Visual Studio 创建继承自的类的实例<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase" /> object that this <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase" /> object extends.
trans-unit.target: 获取此 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase" /> 对象扩展的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The object that this <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase" /> object extends.
trans-unit.target: 此 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase" /> 对象扩展的对象。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when this <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase" /> instance is closing.
trans-unit.target: 关闭此 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase" /> 实例时发生。

trans-unit.source: You can use this event to release application-specific resources that were allocated earlier, for example, in the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase.Load> event.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用此事件来释放已分配更早版本，例如，在应用程序特定资源<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase.Load>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the Inspector window, or the Explorer window in Outlook, that is associated with this Ribbon.
trans-unit.target: 获取 Outlook 中与此功能区关联的检查器窗口或资源管理器窗口。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that represents the Inspector window or Explorer window that is associated with this <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Object" />，表示与此 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase" /> 对象关联的检查器窗口或资源管理器窗口。

trans-unit.source: In Outlook, this property refers to the Inspector window or Explorer window in which this <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase> is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 在 Outlook 中，此属性指的检查器窗口或资源管理器窗口中此<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase>显示。

trans-unit.source: In all other Office projects, this property returns null.
trans-unit.target: 在所有其他 Office 项目中，此属性返回 null。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 <see langword="true" />；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase" /> class and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 释放 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase" /> 类使用的非托管资源，并可以选择释放托管资源。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法称为由公共`Dispose()`方法和<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()` 调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> 调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase> references.
trans-unit.target: 当`disposing`参数为 true 时，此方法释放由任何托管对象持有的全部资源此<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase>引用。

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="Dispose" /> can be called multiple times by other objects.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Dispose" /> 可以由其他对象多次调用。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see langword="Dispose(Boolean) " />be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to <see langword="Dispose" />.
trans-unit.target: 在重写<see langword="Dispose(Boolean) " />请注意不要引用已释放的以前调用中的对象<see langword="Dispose" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to implement<see langword=" Dispose(Boolean)" />, see [Implementing a Dispose Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/eb4e1af0-3b48-4fbc-ad4e-fc2f64138bf9).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何实现详细信息<see langword=" Dispose(Boolean)" />，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/eb4e1af0-3b48-4fbc-ad4e-fc2f64138bf9)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about <see langword="Dispose" /> and <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a17b0066-71c2-4ba4-9822-8e19332fc213).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息<see langword="Dispose" />和<see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a17b0066-71c2-4ba4-9822-8e19332fc213)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the Ribbon factory that is associated with this <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置与此 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase" /> 关联的功能区工厂。

trans-unit.source: An object that implements the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonFactory" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: 一个实现 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonFactory" /> 接口的对象。

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to track the Ribbon factory class that created the current instance of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase>.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用此属性来跟踪创建的当前实例的功能区工厂类<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that determines whether this <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase" /> can be used in multiple contexts simultaneously.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值确定此 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase" /> 是否可以同时在多个上下文中使用。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase" /> object is shared among multiple contexts; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果此 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase" /> 对象在多个上下文中共享，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase> objects that have this property set to `false` are created every time a new Outlook Inspector is opened.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase> 具有此属性设置为对象`false`每次打开新的 Outlook 检查器时创建。

trans-unit.source: This property can be set only before the Ribbon is loaded into the Office application.
trans-unit.target: 只能在功能区加载到 Office 应用程序之前，可以设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: For information about setting this property, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关设置此属性的信息，请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase" /> is loaded into the Microsoft Office application.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase" /> 加载到 Microsoft Office 应用程序时发生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase.Load> event handler is automatically added to the Ribbon code file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase.Load>事件处理程序将自动添加到功能区代码文件。

trans-unit.source: Use this event handler to run custom code when the Ribbon loads.
trans-unit.target: 使用此事件处理程序功能区加载时运行自定义代码。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase" /> loads, if the **ImageName** property is set for one or more controls.
trans-unit.target: 如果为一个或多个控件设置 ImageName 属性，则在 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase" /> 加载时发生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase.LoadImage> event enables you to cache images in the Ribbon customization, which can improve performance.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase.LoadImage>事件，可以缓存中功能区自定义项，这可以提高性能的映像。

trans-unit.source: By default, an image is loaded into the Ribbon every time the user displays a tab that contains the image.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，映像加载到功能区，每次用户显示包含图像的选项卡。

trans-unit.source: An image is reloaded any time that you programmatically change the properties of a control on which the image appears.
trans-unit.target: 映像重新加载，以编程方式更改图像将显示的控件的属性的任何时间。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase.LoadImage> event to assign an image to a control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase.LoadImage>事件将分配给控件的图像。

trans-unit.source: When the user selects a tab on the Ribbon, the Microsoft Office application uses the cached image.
trans-unit.target: 当用户选择功能区上的选项卡时，Microsoft Office 应用程序将使用缓存的映像。

trans-unit.source: If you modify a control property at run time, the Microsoft Office application will not reload the image on the control.
trans-unit.target: 如果在运行时修改控件属性，Microsoft Office 应用程序将不重新加载该控件上的映像。

trans-unit.source: This can give you a small performance gain.
trans-unit.target: 这可以为你提供可略微提高性能。

trans-unit.source: If you want to cache the image of a control, set the **ImageName** property of the control.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要缓存的控件图像，设置**ImageName**的控件属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase.LoadImage> event is not raised unless you set the **ImageName** property of at least one control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase.LoadImage>除非你设置，则不会引发事件**ImageName**至少一个控件的属性。

trans-unit.source: The following example caches the images for two <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton> controls.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例适用于两个缓存图像<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton>控件。

trans-unit.source: To run this code example, you must first perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，必须首先执行以下步骤：

trans-unit.source: Add a **Ribbon (Visual Designer)** to an Office project.
trans-unit.target: 添加**功能区 （可视化设计器）**到 Office 项目。

trans-unit.source: If you are using a Visual Basic project, add the following statement to the top of the Ribbon code file: `Imports Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon`
trans-unit.target: 如果你使用的 Visual Basic 项目，到功能区代码文件的顶部添加以下语句： `Imports Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon`

trans-unit.source: You can then run this code in the generated Ribbon class.
trans-unit.target: 然后可以在生成的功能区类中运行此代码。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of this <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase" /> 的名称。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the name of this <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，包含此 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase" /> 的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of a control shows up in the **Properties** window.
trans-unit.target: 控件的名称显示在**属性**窗口。

trans-unit.source: It is the ID that Microsoft Office uses to identify this <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase>, and it is the name of the instance of this <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase> in your code.
trans-unit.target: 它是 Microsoft Office 可以使用以确定该 ID <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase>，它是此实例的名称和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase>在代码中。

trans-unit.source: This property can be set at run time only under certain conditions.
trans-unit.target: 在运行时仅在某些情况下，可以设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonOfficeMenu" /> that represents the Microsoft Office Menu customization.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个表示 Microsoft Office 菜单自定义项的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonOfficeMenu" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonOfficeMenu" /> that represents the Microsoft Office Menu customization.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonOfficeMenu" />，表示 Microsoft Office 菜单自定义项。

trans-unit.source: The Microsoft Office Menu is the menu that opens when you click the **File** tab (for Microsoft Office 2010) or the **Microsoft Office Button** (for the 2007 Microsoft Office system).
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Office 菜单是当单击打开的菜单**文件**选项卡 （对于 Microsoft Office 2010) 或**Microsoft Office 按钮**（适用于 2007 Microsoft Office 系统）。

trans-unit.source: You can add controls to the Microsoft Office Menu only by using the Ribbon Designer.
trans-unit.target: 只能通过使用功能区设计器，可以将控件添加到 Microsoft Office 菜单。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Add Controls to the Backstage View](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-add-controls-to-the-backstage-view.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 将控件添加到 Backstage 视图](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-add-controls-to-the-backstage-view.md)。

trans-unit.source: You can access a read-only collection of Ribbon controls in the Microsoft Office Menu customization at run time by using the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonOfficeMenu.Items%2A> property of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonOfficeMenu> instance that is exposed by the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase.OfficeMenu%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 可以在运行时的 Microsoft Office 菜单自定义项中的功能区控件的只读集合的访问通过使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonOfficeMenu.Items%2A>属性<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonOfficeMenu>公开由的实例<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase.OfficeMenu%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The following example gets the number of custom controls in the Microsoft Office Menu customization.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例获取 Microsoft Office 菜单自定义项中的自定义控件的数量。

trans-unit.source: To run this code example, you must first add a **Ribbon (Visual Designer)** to an Office project.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，必须首先添加**功能区 （可视化设计器）**到 Office 项目。

trans-unit.source: You can then run this code in the generated Ribbon class.
trans-unit.target: 然后可以在生成的功能区类中运行此代码。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonComponent" /> that represents the parent of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonComponent" /> of this <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个表示此 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonComponent" /> 的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonComponent" /> 的父级的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonComponent" /> that represents the parent of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonComponent" /> of this <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示此 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonComponent" /> 的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonComponent" /> 的父级的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase" />。

trans-unit.source: Calls the <c>Microsoft.Office.Core.IRibbonUI.InvalidateControl</c> method of the parent control if the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonComponent" /> of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase" /> has a dynamic parent, such as a dynamic menu, and layout is not suspended.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase" /> 的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonComponent" /> 具有一个动态父级（如动态菜单）且布局未挂起，则调用父控件的 <c>Microsoft.Office.Core.IRibbonUI.InvalidateControl</c> 方法。

trans-unit.source: If the parent is not dynamic, this method calls the `Microsoft.Office.Core.IRibbonUI.InvalidateControl` method of the current control if the layout is not suspended.
trans-unit.target: 如果父不是动态的此方法调用`Microsoft.Office.Core.IRibbonUI.InvalidateControl`如果布局则不会挂起当前控件的方法。

trans-unit.source: Refreshes the Ribbon user interface.
trans-unit.target: 刷新功能区用户界面。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonComponent.ResumeLayout%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonComponent.ResumeLayout%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Internally, this method calls the `Microsoft.Office.Core.IRibbonUI.Invalidate` method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法在内部调用`Microsoft.Office.Core.IRibbonUI.Invalidate`方法。

trans-unit.source: Reverses the effect of the <see cref="M:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase.SuspendLayout" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 取消 <see cref="M:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase.SuspendLayout" /> 方法的效果。

trans-unit.source: Calling <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase.SuspendLayout%2A> may result in a slight performance increase if your application has many controls that are frequently updated.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase.SuspendLayout%2A>可能会导致性能稍有增加，如果你的应用程序具有很多会频繁更新的控件。

trans-unit.source: After you change the state of each control, you can call <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase.ResumeLayout%2A> to allow the UI to be refreshed.
trans-unit.target: 更改每个控件的状态后，你可以调用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase.ResumeLayout%2A>以允许 UI 进行刷新。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to call the <see cref="M:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase.PerformLayout" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要调用 <see cref="M:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase.PerformLayout" /> 方法，请使用 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> to enable UI refreshes without calling <see cref="M:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase.PerformLayout" />.
trans-unit.target: 若要启用 UI 刷新，而不调用 <see cref="M:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase.PerformLayout" />，请使用 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Reverses the effect of the <see cref="M:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase.SuspendLayout" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 取消 <see cref="M:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase.SuspendLayout" /> 方法的效果。

trans-unit.source: Gets the Ribbon ID that was used to create this instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 获取用于创建 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase" /> 类的此实例的功能区 ID。

trans-unit.source: The Ribbon ID that was used to create this instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 用于创建 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase" /> 类的此实例的功能区 ID。

trans-unit.source: You should not attempt to set this property.
trans-unit.target: 不应尝试设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase.RibbonType%2A> property to get all of the Ribbon IDs that are associated with this <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase> instance.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase.RibbonType%2A>要获取与此相关联的功能区 Id 的所有属性<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase>实例。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase.RibbonId%2A> property returns only the single ID that was used to create this <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase> instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase.RibbonId%2A>属性返回仅用于创建此单个 ID<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase>实例。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use this property to determine whether this Ribbon instance is being displayed in a mail composition item.
trans-unit.target: 例如，可以使用此属性来确定是否正在邮件组合项中显示的此功能区实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets a comma-separated list of Ribbon IDs that are associated with this <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 获取功能区 ID 的逗号分隔的列表，这些功能区 ID 与此 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase" /> 实例相关联。

trans-unit.source: A comma-separated list of Ribbon IDs that are associated with this <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 功能区 ID 的逗号分隔的列表，这些功能区 ID 与此 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase" /> 实例相关联。

trans-unit.source: Excel, Word, and PowerPoint typically have only one Ribbon ID in this property.
trans-unit.target: Excel、 Word 和 PowerPoint 通常在此属性中具有只有一个功能区 ID。

trans-unit.source: Outlook can have several IDs, corresponding to the various message classes for which the particular <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase> instance is valid.
trans-unit.target: Outlook 可以拥有多个 Id，为其对应的各个消息类特定<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase>实例无效。

trans-unit.source: The designer provides a drop-down list of valid Ribbon IDs.
trans-unit.target: 设计器提供有效的功能区 Id 的下拉列表。

trans-unit.source: Ribbon IDs are used to associate a Ribbon class with a particular context window.
trans-unit.target: 功能区 Id 用于将功能区类与特定的上下文窗口相关联。

trans-unit.source: This property can be set only before the Ribbon is loaded into the Office application.
trans-unit.target: 只能在功能区加载到 Office 应用程序之前，可以设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: For information about setting this property, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关设置此属性的信息，请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <c>IRibbonUI</c> instance that is provided by the Microsoft Office application to the Ribbon extensibility code.
trans-unit.target: 获取 Microsoft Office 应用程序提供给功能区扩展性代码的 <c>IRibbonUI</c> 实例。

trans-unit.source: The <c>IRibbonUI</c> instance that is provided by the Office application to the Ribbon extensibility code.
trans-unit.target: <c>IRibbonUI</c>提供了功能区扩展性代码 Office 应用程序的实例。

trans-unit.source: This property can be used to update Ribbon UI.
trans-unit.target: 此属性可以用于更新功能区 UI。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to hide all built-in tabs on the Ribbon and most commands on the Microsoft Office Menu and display only the customizations that are defined in this Ribbon item.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否隐藏功能区上的所有内置选项卡和 Microsoft Office 菜单上的大部分命令，并且是否仅显示在此功能区项中定义的自定义项。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the Ribbon displays only the customizations that are defined in this Ribbon item; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果功能区仅显示在此功能区项中定义的自定义项，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property can be set only before the Ribbon is loaded into the Office application.
trans-unit.target: 只能在功能区加载到 Office 应用程序之前，可以设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: For information about setting this property, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关设置此属性的信息，请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: You cannot change the visibility of custom tabs at run time if this property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 你不能在运行时更改的自定义选项卡可见性，如果此属性设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: Prevents the Microsoft Office application from refreshing the state of controls on the Ribbon.
trans-unit.target: 阻止 Microsoft Office 应用程序刷新功能区上的控件状态。

trans-unit.source: Calling <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase.SuspendLayout%2A> may result in a slight performance increase if your application has many controls that are frequently updated.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase.SuspendLayout%2A>可能会导致性能稍有增加，如果你的应用程序具有很多会频繁更新的控件。

trans-unit.source: After you change the state of each control, you can call <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase.ResumeLayout%2A> to allow the UI to be refreshed.
trans-unit.target: 更改每个控件的状态后，你可以调用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase.ResumeLayout%2A>以允许 UI 进行刷新。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonTab" /> objects in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonOfficeMenu" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonTab" /> 中 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonOfficeMenu" /> 对象的集合。

trans-unit.source: A collection of <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonTab" /> objects in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonOfficeMenu" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonTab" /> 中 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonOfficeMenu" /> 对象的集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets application-specific data that is associated with this <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置与此 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase" /> 关联的应用程序特定的数据。

trans-unit.source: An <c>System.Object</c> that represents application-specific data that is associated with this <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase" />.
trans-unit.target: <c>System.Object</c>表示与此关联的应用程序特定数据<see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase" />。

trans-unit.source: Any type derived from the `System.Object` class can be assigned to this property.
trans-unit.target: 从派生的任何类型`System.Object`类可以分配给此属性。

trans-unit.source: However, if you set the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase.Tag%2A> property in the Visual Studio **Properties** window, you can only assign text.
trans-unit.target: 但是，如果你设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase.Tag%2A>Visual Studio 中的属性**属性**窗口中，你可以仅将文本分配。
